response.job_title: Mechatronics Engineering. Industrial Automation. Digital Transformation. TechConnect. Contract Renewal Specialist.
response.summary:
Joaarevaloro@gmail.com
Cellphone : +57 300 5744331
Telephone: +57 3653383

Jorge seeks to understand the needs of his clients and provide them with industrial automation solutions, which allows them to help them reach their goals; always focusing on efficiency and innovation.

Jorge seeks to develop his technical and commercial skills, focused on automating the operational process of the position. Use of the tools and software to which the company has access, in order to obtain a better performance and better visibility of customers.

Focused on the search and implementation of technologically innovative solutions and the development of new applications with the support of a team with trajectory and global recognition.

Passion for sport, art and creativity.

profile_positions.description: Monitor the day-to-day operations of the support team. Responsible for estabilishing procedures and ensuring services levels are maintained. Responsbile for documentating, tracking and monitoring problems to ensure timely responses, first call resolutions and overall A+ customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Support Services Lead

profile_positions.description:
Provide remote support for software and hardware applications that Command Alkon offers in the building materials industry. Software and hardware troubleshooting as well as proprietary product integration and upgrade.

Specialized in supporting networks, databases, peripherals, software and autonomous hardware of the company.
profile_positions.title: Software Support Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the renewal of contracts for the TechConnect support service for the entire Andean Region. With commercial and negotiation approach, customer service and technical knowledge.

Development of commercial skills, focused on automating the operational process of the position. Use of the tools and software to which the company has access, in order to obtain a better performance and better visibility of customers and their contracts to renew.
profile_positions.title: Contract Renewal Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Professional internship consisting in the rotation by the different business units in Rockwell Automation (Systems and Solutions, Services and Sales).

Development of an augmented reality experience based on cloud services, combining Rockwell Automation tools (Allan Bradley, RSLinx, Studio 5000) and PTC software (KEPserverEX, Thingworx and Vuforia) which has the ability to enable customers in the business decision making in an agile and fast way.

As part of the Rockwell Automation remote support team, I had the opportunity to interact first-hand with clients from most industries in Latin America. This allowed me to have a better understanding of the main challenges customers deal with and propose solutions that guarantee the operation of their applications.

Knowledge of the different business segments, sales channels, catalog of products and services offered to customers within Rockwell Automation.
profile_positions.title: Potential Engineer

company.name: Command Alkon
company.description:
Command Alkon is the leading software and solutions provider bringing together technology and people for the heavy building industry.

Command Alkon’s customer-focused suite of technologies automate and streamline all aspects of the heavy building materials industry. 

Command Alkon is headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama and has offices in locations around the globe. 

For more information, visit www.commandalkon.com.
